GSD.description:
hamradio: improve the incomplete fix to avoid NPD

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.169 by commit a5c6a13e9056d87805ba3042c208fbd4164ad22b. For more details please see the references link.
